items.sentence: Anyone can learn to juggle with a bit of practice.
Anyone stupid enough to go there is asking for it.
Why don\'t you just come clean and tell the truth?
Why don\'t you just tell me the rest of the story?
Why don\'t you meet me out front in a few minutes?
Why don\'t you start by telling us where you went?
Why don\'t you tell me where you got that diamond?
I used to ride my bike to my grandparents\' house.
I used to walk past Tom\'s house almost every day.
Tom decided to learn all he could about computers.
Every time I read this book, I find something new.
I can build your dog a doghouse if you want me to.
I have a friend whose father is a famous novelist.
I just got up. Give me a few minutes to get ready.
I speak French more fluently than I speak English.
I talked with my parents about my studying abroad.
I think you and I had better have a talk with Tom.
Your sister is lazier than all the other students.
Tom, you\'re an adult now. Try to behave like one.
Try to make sure Tom doesn\'t do something stupid.
